params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content per gram of feed

params.name: minerals
params.description: Minerals content per gram of feed

params.name: vitamins
params.description: Vitamins content per mg of feed

objective.name: min_cost
objective.expr: quicksum(price[f] * x[f] for f in F)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of feed

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(protein[f] * x[f] * 1000 for f in F)

constraints.name: minerals_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(minerals[f] * x[f] * 1000 for f in F)

constraints.name: vitamins_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(vitamins[f] * x[f] * 1000 for f in F)
